title: Securing sponsorship with clarity
context: Composite of internationally trained analysts navigating Skilled Worker sponsorship conversations while fielding opaque recruiter guidance.
session_flow: Mapped current visa timelines and identified non-negotiables for the household.
Drafted outreach language that states sponsorship requirements without apologising.
Planned weekly follow-up blocks and rehearsed holding boundaries when timelines slipped.
boundary_and_consent: Agreed to pause when conversations triggered immigration-related anxiety spikes.
Confirmed we would only role-play scenarios they explicitly opted into.
timeframe: 6 sessions over 10 weeks with check-in notes between meetings.
shift: Client practised naming visa parameters early and stopped investing in employers who could not sponsor.
outcome: Within two months they negotiated a written sponsorship timeline and a relocation allowance that respected family needs.
disclaimer: Composite scenario blending details across several clients to protect confidentiality.
